## Peripheral Illumination Correction

Choose from values between â€“5 and +5. Choosing positive values increases peripheral illumination, while choosing negative values reduces peripheral illumination. Positive values are recommended for vintage lenses, negative values to create the effect of images taken with an antique lens or a pinhole camera.

!Peripheral Illumination Correction
